news.title: Two Works Featured in 'Confini da Gauguin a Hopper' Exhibition
news.description: Two artworks are displayed in the major exhibition 'Confini da Gauguin a Hopper - Canto con variazioni' curated by Marco Goldin and organized by Erpac and Linea d'ombra at Villa Manin di Passariano (UD). Exhibition runs from October 11, 2025 to April 12, 2026.

news.title: New Publication: 'La Forma Infinita. Sulla Pittura di Andrea Gotti'
news.description: Upcoming release of the book 'La Forma Infinita. Sulla Pittura di Andrea Gotti' (The Infinite Form. On Andrea Gotti's Painting) by Simone Furlani and Alessandro Berinetto, scheduled for 2026.
